title: Location Services bug
content: How do I enable location services for a web site? Articles I currently read here do not work. Even after I say Yes to a site to allow, it doesn't show up in my Settings - Location Permissions window -- and there is no way to add a web site into the Website - Status box. I'm using the latest Firefox, any advice for a possible work around for this bug appreciated.
creator: gh25479

title: Online metronome no longer makes sound. I get this message. "Your browser does not support the Web Audio standard. Please update your browser or install a more modern browser such as Google Chrome."
content:
I go to this page https://www.flutetunes.com/metronome/

I get this message "Your browser does not support the Web Audio standard. Please update your browser or install a more modern browser such as Google Chrome."

I've used this metronome for years on Firefox, but now I get no sound. The metronome seems to be running, but it makes no sound. Help!
creator: sonofrest

title: Wrong Country on Firefox/Google home page
content: I'm in Western Australia. I use Firefox/Google as my Home page but it keeps showing that I'm in New Zealand. When I search my responses are New Zealand based.
creator: janijako

title: My Ooma dot com
content: I just switched my VOIP service to ooma. Starting sunday i got the account and login all set up. Visited several times sunday and this(monday) morning. Starting this afternoon i an unable to pull up the site using firefox unless i use a private window(works fine that way). Edge also lets me login to my account with out any issues. If use a google search to take me to a login screen i get "problem loading page" and "the page isnt redirecting properly". If i click on my saved bookmark /tile to go there i get "we're sorry, but something went wrong" and "If you are the application owner check the logs for more information." I have no clue what logs they are talking about...I dont know why it stopped working. I tried looking through settings for something and turning off ublock for that site(even though it previously was fine) without any change. Can someone provide some insight.
creator: callwill

title: Continuous errors with firefox loading webpages
content:
Hi, this is driving me up the wall and I'm about to change over to chrome if it can't be fixed. For over a week now, firefox has been erroring on a heap of websites (I got 3 page and loading errors just trying to log into this site, so it's not an unsecure webpage problem.) If you refresh the page 1-3 times it'll usually go through. Once it's gone through, it'll usually allow you to use that site for at least a while before starting to error again.

I've disabled all addons except my adblocker, norton safe search and privacy badger add ons (all of which I've had for ages with no problems). Computer has been scanned as virus free. No problems with other browsers. Any ideas please?

Typical example message when trying to open a page.

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to diaryofanottb.com. PR_END_OF_FILE_ERROR 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.
creator: jacideepblue

title: Firefox 94.01 for Mac disconnects from GMail, other Google apps
content:
My Firefox browser (94.01) disconnects from GMail and all associated Google apps (Calendar, Doc, Sheets, etc) after a few minutes. Since everything at my work is on Google, I have to restart the browser. I have uninstalled all my Firefox extensions except for Ad Block Plus. I have cleared all cookies and the cache. The problem still remains.

I am using a Macbook Air with macOS Monterey.

Thanks!
creator: marc.hogan

title: Sync 2 laptops
content: I am trying to sync my new laptop to my old one. I have set my old laptop to sync bookmarks, etc. I logged in to my new laptop and clicked on sync, but nothing happens.
creator: ellenhargis1

title: Instagram Posts Cut Off On Right Hand Side
content: The right hand side of posts is cut off. The Like icon are half cut. Sometimes the content/text of the comment is cut off too. It does renders completely fine on other browsers, like Chrome.
creator: Snaky2011
